class epyk.core.html.HtmlFiles.DropFile(report, vals, tooltip, report_name, file_type, profile)¶
drop(url=None, jsData=None, jsFncs=None, httpCodes=None, isPyData=True, refresh=True, extensions=None)¶

Add a drag and drop property to the element

Usage:

d = rptObj.ui.div()

d.drop([rptObj.js.objects.data.toRecord([1, 2, 3, 4], “result”)])

  • preventDefault – Boolean.

Return self to allow the chaining
